column5: MVIS SP up 2 MVIS down 3 about right hey WTF Create some shareholder value PM 26 days below a 1 Here comes our delisting notice on Monday FML being long this one

MVIS what incentive does management have to create a business with actual revenues As far as I can see none because they make out like bandits even if the company fails to sell anything except more shares
MVIS Loser Today is MVIS CEOs shifted latest target date for order entry three weeks and six days
MVIS until they announce a revenue producing order this Co looses 100k per day and at these prices LPC need to sell us bag holders an additional 130k shares just to pay the bills Tick Tock
MVIS not even a short ban and market rally can stop this from dropping
